oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soils characteristics affecting BNF of organically grown red clover in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study we will study the variation of sward yield, its clover content and biological nitrogen fixation of red clover of a two hectares field under organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja (2004) Soils characteristics affecting BNF of organically grown red clover in Finland. Paper at: 14th International congress on nitrogen fixation, Beijing, China, Oct 27 - Nov 1, 2004.
